goals.active: Join your krewe to compete for the Snaff Prize.
goals.complete: My krewe and I presented our Massively Impressive Golem (MIG) before the Snaff Prize judges, and they were suitably impressedâ€”until the MIG went haywire and ran off. We still took the Snaff Prize, but none of us can claim the title "Snaff Prize Savant" until we recover the MIG.
